ygData.subject: Re: Experience gap
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I set my own personal gap of never grouping with someone 3 lvls before me, therefor a maximum of 2.  From what other people have told me, I have no
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I set my own personal gap of never grouping with someone 3 lvls before me, therefor a maximum of 2. From what other people have told me, I have no personal knowledge of this, the experience gap can be no more than 3 lvls. So if you are lvl 8 and you group with someone of lvl 12 you would gain no exp.

Tandeyan, Dark Elf Wizard
-----Original Message-----
From: Don Bickner <bick@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, April 19, 1999 8:17 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Experience gap


Since we Wizzies need to be in a group most of the time, does anyone know at what point in the exp gap it is unwise to group with a person.I am now lvl 8 and am grouping with 10 and 11 lvl tanks and am seeing very slow exp movement.Thanks
